```css
// Property: hidesBarsOnTap
// Description: Set this to true to hide the navigation bar on tap.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window, Ti.UI.iOS.SplitWindow
'.hides-bars-on-tap': { hidesBarsOnTap: true }
'.hides-bars-on-tap-false': { hidesBarsOnTap: false }
```
